title: How to Have a Winter Morning Routine

title: How to Have a Great Morning Routine Before School

title: How to Enjoy a Sunrise

title: How to Make Breakfast in Bed
steps: Get a tray that has small sides on it.

Add some nice touches:.
When you bring the breakfast, put it aside while you prepare the area.
